testcase.name: I trying connect to embedded space write and read from the space

error.message: Cannot introduce a type named 'java.lang.String' without an id property defined. Having a type without an id property would prevent modifying (update/change) objects of that type after they were written to the space. (you can disable this protection, though it is not recommended, by setting the following system property: com.gs.protectiveMode.typeWithoutId=false)
